summary: A definition is an exact word or phrase of the meaning, nature, or limits of something.
full_text:
A definition is a statement of the meaning of a term .  Definitions can be classified into two large categories, intensional definitions  and extensional definitions . A term may have many different senses and multiple meanings, and thus require multiple definitions.
In mathematics, a definition is used to give a precise meaning to a new term, instead of describing a pre-existing term. Definitions and axioms are the basis on which all of mathematics is constructed.
title: Definition
